court: IN IN IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
judgment_text:
:1:

IN IN IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY

IN IN IN ITS INSOLVENCY JURISDICTION ITS INSOLVENCY JURISDICTION ITS INSOLVENCY JURISDICTION

OFFICIAL OFFICIAL OFFICIAL ASSIGNEE S REPORT DATED 1ST DECEMBER, 2006 ASSIGNEE S REPORT DATED 1ST DECEMBER, 2006 ASSIGNEE S REPORT DATED 1ST DECEMBER, 2006

IN IN IN

INSOLVENCY INSOLVENCY INSOLVENCY NO. 17 OF 1961 NO. 17 OF 1961 NO. 17 OF 1961

Re: K.C. Sharma

...Insolvent.

Ex-parte :

Shantilal Amarchand Jain.

... Petitionign Creditors.

....

Mr. Y.C. Parikh, Official Assignee present.

.....

CORAM CORAM CORAM : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,J. : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,J. : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,J.

th th th DECEMBER 2006. DECEMBER 2006. DECEMBER 2006.

P.C. P.C. P.C. : : :

.

An order of adjudication was passed on 7th February

.

The

Official

Assignee

had

declared

the

first

dividend of Rs.0.25 ps. in a rupee on 11th November 1964

to the preferential Creditors.

.

At present, an aggregate amount of Rs.6270.51 ps.is

lying to the credit of the estate account. In the present

case, no further recoveries are possible.

.

The Official Assignee has prayed that balance of

Rs.6270.51 ps.

may be refunded to the erstwhile Insolvent

as

the

Insolvency

has been Annulled under a

Scheme

of

Composition

and if the Insolvent fails to claim the

said

amount

within specified period, then the said amount

may

be transferred to the unclaimed dividend capital account

under Rule 178 of the Bombay Insolvency Rules, 1910

:2:

.

Having regard to the circumstances set out in the

report

of

the Official Assignee, there is no reason

why

the prayers should not be granted.

Prayer clauses (a) and

(b) of the report of the Official Assignee are accordingly

granted.

-----
reasoning: Rule matches: {'dismissed': ['fails']}; selected 'dismissed' with score 1.50. Found synonym 'granted' but negated
